readable.title: 3258394043_a0b6a94dce
readable.content: a boy holds up his paper while men stand around a table . A group of adults and children doing some activity on a sidewalk outside . A little girl in a pink jacket is in the middle of the frame . Several people are preparing to film a scene involving a young schoolgirl and a young schoolboy . Two little kids are on a production set with seven adults .
